verbs.description: [ARG1: The summit between North and South Korea] [V: was] [ARG2: short on details] but built goodwill for Kim Jong Un 's meeting with Donald Trump in the coming weeks .
[ARG0: The summit between North and South Korea] was short on details but [V: built] [ARG1: goodwill for Kim Jong Un 's meeting with Donald Trump in the coming weeks] .
The summit between North and South Korea was short on details but built goodwill for Kim Jong Un 's meeting with Donald Trump in the [V: coming] [ARG1: weeks] .
